item.title: InterFace Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“p00n scape, post:1, topic:306548”]Help With this [Unrenamed] Magic teleport Interface I cannot Seem to figure it out i dunno what,How, To place the Codes? i never done this befor and i want to learnn So please? help a lilbits
I did everything But i just have to change the orbs And add the interface of mage can someone tell me how its done? heres my Code of the magic tab that i ahve right now

[size=17pt]MY CODES FROM CLICKINGMOST.JAVA! OF THE TELEPORT [/size]

case 6004: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Mith Dragon", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 51013: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Mith Dragon", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 73116: case 6005: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight cave", 16355); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 16354); c.sendQuest("Assault", 16352); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break; case 51023: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight cave", 16355); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 16354); c.sendQuest("Assault", 16352); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break;

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402316.0.html <----THE TUT

[size=16pt]CODES THAT ARE IN CLASS9.JAVA[/size]

public static void teleports2(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intteleports2 = addDTab(16400); intteleports2.anIntArray240 = new int[14]; intteleports2.anIntArray241 = new int[14]; intteleports2.anIntArray272 = new int[14]; intteleports2.anIntArray240[0] = 16401; intteleports2.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intteleports2.anIntArray272[0] = 20; //Main sprite addSprite(16401, 0, 0, "button 770"); //Control 16402 (0) intteleports2.anIntArray240[1] = 16402; intteleports2.anIntArray241[1] = 4; intteleports2.anIntArray272[1] = 166; //Button addActionButton(16402, 68, 67, "Caves", "button 775"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16403 (1) intteleports2.anIntArray240[2] = 16403; intteleports2.anIntArray241[2] = 19; intteleports2.anIntArray272[2] = 216; //Label addText(16403, "Caves ", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16404 (2) intteleports2.anIntArray240[3] = 16404; intteleports2.anIntArray241[3] = 100; intteleports2.anIntArray272[3] = 165; //Button addActionButton(16404, 68, 68, "Slayer Tower", "button 776"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16405 (3) intteleports2.anIntArray240[4] = 16405; intteleports2.anIntArray241[4] = 56; intteleports2.anIntArray272[4] = 111; //Button addActionButton(16405, 71, 71, "Island", "button 774"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16406 (4) intteleports2.anIntArray240[5] = 16406; intteleports2.anIntArray241[5] = 106; intteleports2.anIntArray272[5] = 98; //Label addText(16406, "Dagg Lair", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16407 (5) intteleports2.anIntArray240[6] = 16407; intteleports2.anIntArray241[6] = 61; intteleports2.anIntArray272[6] = 21; //Label addText(16407, "Teleports", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16408 (6) intteleports2.anIntArray240[7] = 16408; intteleports2.anIntArray241[7] = 4; intteleports2.anIntArray272[7] = 50; //Button addActionButton(16408, 78, 60, "Rock Crabs", "button 772"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16409 (7) intteleports2.anIntArray240[8] = 16409; intteleports2.anIntArray241[8] = 104; intteleports2.anIntArray272[8] = 53; //Button addActionButton(16409, 72, 58, "Dagg Lair", "button 773"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16410 (8) intteleports2.anIntArray240[9] = 16410; intteleports2.anIntArray241[9] = 15; intteleports2.anIntArray272[9] = 99; //Label addText(16410, "Rock Crabs", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16411 (9) intteleports2.anIntArray240[10] = 16411; intteleports2.anIntArray241[10] = 20; intteleports2.anIntArray272[10] = 238; //Close button addCloseButton(16411, "button 777", 148, 25, "Close"); //Control 16412 (10) intteleports2.anIntArray240[11] = 16412; intteleports2.anIntArray241[11] = 69; intteleports2.anIntArray272[11] = 164; //Label addText(16412, "Island", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16413 (11) intteleports2.anIntArray240[12] = 16413; intteleports2.anIntArray241[12] = 72; intteleports2.anIntArray272[12] = 241; //Label addText(16413, "Cancel", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16414 (12) intteleports2.anIntArray240[13] = 16414; intteleports2.anIntArray241[13] = 124; intteleports2.anIntArray272[13] = 214; //Label addText(16414, "Slayer", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Added 13 controls. } public static void teleports1(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intteleports1 = addDTab(16350); intteleports1.anIntArray240 = new int[12]; intteleports1.anIntArray241 = new int[12]; intteleports1.anIntArray272 = new int[12]; intteleports1.anIntArray240[0] = 16351; intteleports1.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intteleports1.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(16351, 0, 0, "button 770"); //Control 16352 (0) intteleports1.anIntArray240[1] = 16352; intteleports1.anIntArray241[1] = 14; intteleports1.anIntArray272[1] = 169; //Button addActionButton(16352, 72, 58, "Assault", "button 785"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16353 (1) intteleports1.anIntArray240[2] = 16353; intteleports1.anIntArray241[2] = 17; intteleports1.anIntArray272[2] = 215; //Label addText(16353, "Assault", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16354 (2) intteleports1.anIntArray240[3] = 16354; intteleports1.anIntArray241[3] = 59; intteleports1.anIntArray272[3] = 128; //Button addActionButton(16354, 72, 58, "Pest Control", "button 784"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16355 (3) intteleports1.anIntArray240[4] = 16355; intteleports1.anIntArray241[4] = 114; intteleports1.anIntArray272[4] = 58; //Button addActionButton(16355, 72, 58, "Fight Pits", "button 783"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16356 (4) intteleports1.anIntArray240[5] = 16356; intteleports1.anIntArray241[5] = 111; intteleports1.anIntArray272[5] = 109; //Label addText(16356, "Fight Pits", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16357 (5) intteleports1.anIntArray240[6] = 16357; intteleports1.anIntArray241[6] = 62; intteleports1.anIntArray272[6] = 21; //Label addText(16357, "Teleports", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16358 (6) intteleports1.anIntArray240[7] = 16358; intteleports1.anIntArray241[7] = 14; intteleports1.anIntArray272[7] = 110; //Label addText(16358, "Barrows", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16359 (7) intteleports1.anIntArray240[8] = 16359; intteleports1.anIntArray241[8] = 4; intteleports1.anIntArray272[8] = 53; //Button addActionButton(16359, 47, 60, "Barrows", "button 782"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 16360 (8) intteleports1.anIntArray240[9] = 16360; intteleports1.anIntArray241[9] = 19; intteleports1.anIntArray272[9] = 235; //Close button addCloseButton(16360, "button 777", 148, 25, "Close"); //Control 16361 (9) intteleports1.anIntArray240[10] = 16361; intteleports1.anIntArray241[10] = 80; intteleports1.anIntArray272[10] = 167; //Label addText(16361, "Pest", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 16362 (10) intteleports1.anIntArray240[11] = 16362; intteleports1.anIntArray241[11] = 72; intteleports1.anIntArray272[11] = 239; //Label addText(16362, "Cancel", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Added 11 controls. }[/quote]

Read through the posts on my topic, and coon posted on how to get the button ids of the current ones.

Read full topic
